name: Tiler
tagline: The dashboard framework based on Vert.x and React
body:
# Tiler

The dashboard framework that uses Java and Vert.x for the server side code and React for the browser-side UI.  Emphasises reusable open source "collectors" for pulling metrics into your dashboards and reusable React components (tiles) for the UI of your dashboards
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
